name: watch-flood-documentary-nashville-rises-online
title: Watch Flood Documentary “Nashville Rises” Online
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Narrated by Billy Bob Thornton, NASHVILLE RISES tells the emotional story about the city of Nashville’s extraordinary response to the worst natural disaster to ever hit the region. This is the story about the power of the human spirit, and how neighbor helped neighbor to overcome tragedy.

We were fortunate enough to have the opportunity to see Nashville Rises at the Nashville Film Festival this year, but for those of you who didn’t catch it there or on NPT when it aired earlier this month, the documentary is now available to watch on Vimeo.
